sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 259.03 Definitions.—The following terms and phrases when used in this chapter shall have the meanings ascribed to them in this section, except where the context clearly indicates a different meaning:

sections.heading: Reinstitution of payments in lieu of taxes; duration.
sections.text: of payments in lieu of taxes; duration.

sections.heading: Tax increment financing for conservation lands.
Purchase of lands in areas of critical state concern; recommendations by department and land authorities.

sections.heading: Acquisition of land on which an agricultural lease exists.
sections.text: of land on which an agricultural lease exists.

sections.heading: Construction
sections.text: 259.06 Construction.—The provisions of ss. 259.01-259.06 shall be liberally construed in a manner to accomplish the purposes thereof.
